sentences.sentence: The value of Japan decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012, then it increase greatly by 2015; while China keep stable between 2010 and 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of Japan decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012, then it increase greatly by 2015; while China keep stable between 2010 and 2015.
